channel.title: Item placement and ip changing?
channel.description:
[b]Ok, so i have a server and it has a donator option on it. If you donate you get the option to buy custom phats.
This is all good, except there is 1 problem I cannot seem to fix. When you wear any type of donator phat (bronze, iron, steel, mith, addy, rune, dragon, barrows, bandos, armadyl), it wields in the place of a weapon. So you cannot wield a weapon while wearing a custom phat and you can wear a helmet while wearing a phat. I know there is propbally a simple method of fixing this problem and I would be very happy if somebody replies to tell me.
Also it has been so long since I have made a server, the server I have now also has a client with it. So people can download it off uppit etc. but how do i change the ip on that so that both they can access it and so can I? (Bearing in mind I can only access my server with the ip set as 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0)
Any replies would be useful. Thanks. Dillon.[/b]

item.title: Item placement and ip changing?
item.dc:creator: @Ii_Claw_iI Ii Claw iI
item.description:
@Ii_Claw_iI wrote:

Open Item.java. Press ctrl+f and search for “Hat”. Now you should see alot of hat ids just add the p hats ids there.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

search ip in gui.java until u find something then u will have to type 127.0.0.1 between the two “” like “127.0.0.1”

item.title: Item placement and ip changing?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

  1. Stop using bold please.
  2. For the second quest, copy the client you have onto your desktop. Then open it. Change the ip to you server ip. Then rar it and upload it. The original one, you use to play on.
